item.ID: Visible Rule - Show Ristrict Notify Process List

rule.ID: Visible Rule - Show Ristrict Notify Process List

query.sfwSql:
SELECT SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE_FILE, MAX(CASE_ID) AS CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) GROUP BY CASE_FILE ) C ON SP.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID WHERE
ONLINE_IND = 'Y' GROUP BY SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID ORDER BY NAME
query.sfwPostgre:
SELECT SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE_FILE, MAX(CASE_ID) AS CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE GROUP BY CASE_FILE ) C ON SP.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SP.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID WHERE
ONLINE_IND = 'Y' GROUP BY SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID ORDER BY NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.NAME, SP.DESCRIPTION FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGS_USER_ROLES UR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID AND UR.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID) ORDER BY SP.NAME
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.NAME, SP.DESCRIPTION FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WHERE EXISTS (SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA INNER JOIN SGS_USER_ROLES UR ON SA.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID AND UR.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID) ORDER BY SP.NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBP.* FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = GETDATE() AND STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV') AS C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') AS ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID)AS BPM_CASE ON SBP.CASE_ID = BPM_CASE.CASE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_user_roles b WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_resources d WITH(NOLOCK) , sgs_security e WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date < = convert(dateTime, convert(char, getdate(), 103), 103))) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date > = convert(dateTime, convert(char, getdate(), 103), 103))) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where PROCESS_ID >0 ORDER BY name
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SBP.*, CURRENT_VERSION FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP INNER JOIN (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE < = sysdate AND STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV') C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID) BPM_CASE ON SBP.CASE_ID = BPM_CASE.CASE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a , sgs_user_roles b , sgs_resources d , sgs_security e WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date < = sysdate)) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date > = sysdate)) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where Process_id > 0 ORDER BY DESCRIPTION desc
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SBP.*, CURRENT_VERSION FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP INNER JOIN (SELECT sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID, sgw_bpm_case.RESOURCE_ID, CASE WHEN ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS CURRENT_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case left join (SELECT * FROM (SELECT case_id, CASE WHEN (ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY name ORDER BY case_id desc )) = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS ACTIVE_VERSION FROM sgw_bpm_case WHERE EFFECTIVE_DATE <= now() AND STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV') C WHERE ACTIVE_VERSION = 'Y') ACTIVE_BPM_CASE ON sgw_bpm_case.CASE_ID = ACTIVE_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID) BPM_CASE ON SBP.CASE_ID = BPM_CASE.CASE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT distinct d.resource_id, a.USER_ID FROM sgs_user a , sgs_user_roles b , sgs_resources d , sgs_security e WHERE a.user_serial_id = b.user_serial_id AND b.role_id = e.role_id AND e.resource_id = d.resource_id AND ((b.effective_start_DATE is null) or (b.effective_start_date <= now())) AND ((b.effective_end_DATE is null) or (b.effective_end_date >= now())) AND d.RESOURCE_TYPE_VALUE = 'BPM') RES ON RES.RESOURCE_ID = BPM_CASE.RESOURCE_ID where process_id >0 ORDER BY DESCRIPTION desc

query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WHERE PROCESS_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(PROCESS_ID) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS GROUP BY NAME) ORDER BY NAME
query.sfwPostgre: select * from sgw_bpm_process where process_id in(select MAX(process_id) from sgw_bpm_process group by BPM_process_id ) and PROCESS_ID >0
query.sfwOracle: select * from sgw_bpm_process where process_id in(select MAX(process_id) from sgw_bpm_process group by BPM_process_id ) and PROCESS_ID >0

query.sfwSql: SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WHERE PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT BP.PROCESS_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,BC.VERSION) + ')'AS PROCESS_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT BP.PROCESS_ID, bp.process_id, bp.description || '(Ver.' || CAST (bc.version AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS PROCESS_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CASE_ID = @CASE_ID

SELECT BPI.* FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE BCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = BCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE BPI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC') AND BCI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND BCI.PERSON_ID > 0 AND BCI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT BPI.* FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE BCI ON BPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = BCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE BPI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC') AND BCI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND BCI.PERSON_ID > 0 AND BCI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT SGW_BPM_PROCESS.NAME, SGW_BPM_PROCESS.STATUS_VALUE, case SGW_BPM_PROCESS.TYPE_VALUE when 'PERS' then 'PERSON' when 'ORGN' then 'Organization' when 'NONE' then 'None' end AS TYPE_VALUE, SGW_BPM_PROCESS.CASE_ID, SGW_BPM_CASE.NAME AS Case_Name FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SGW_BPM_PROCESS.CASE_ID = SGW_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SGW_BPM_PROCESS.NAME, SGW_BPM_PROCESS.STATUS_VALUE, case SGW_BPM_PROCESS.TYPE_VALUE when 'PERS' then 'PERSON' when 'ORGN' then 'Organization' when 'NONE' then 'None' end AS TYPE_VALUE, SGW_BPM_PROCESS.CASE_ID, SGW_BPM_CASE.NAME AS Case_Name FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE ON SGW_BPM_PROCESS.CASE_ID = SGW_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT CASE_ID, NAME + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, VERSION) + ')' AS NameWithVersion FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CASE_ID in (SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID)
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT CASE_ID, name || '(Ver.' || CAST (version AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS NameWithVersion FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WHERE CASE_ID in (SELECT CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WHERE PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID)

query.sfwSql: SELECT PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV'
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS WHERE STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV'

query.sfwSql:
SELECT SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE_FILE, MAX(CASE_ID) AS CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE WITH(NOLOCK) where
SGW_BPM_CASE.CASE_ID > 0
GROUP BY CASE_FILE ) C ON SP.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SP.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID
GROUP BY SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID ORDER BY NAME
query.sfwPostgre:
SELECT SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE_FILE, MAX(CASE_ID) AS CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE where SGW_BPM_CASE.case_id>0 GROUP BY CASE_FILE ) C ON SP.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SP.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID
GROUP BY SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID ORDER BY NAME
query.sfwOracle:
SELECT SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE_FILE, MAX(CASE_ID) AS CASE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_CASE where SGW_BPM_CASE.case_id>0 GROUP BY CASE_FILE ) C ON SP.CASE_ID = C.CASE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SP.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID
GROUP BY SP.NAME, SP.PROCESS_ID, SP.BPM_PROCESS_ID ORDER BY NAME

query.sfwSql: select * from SGW_BPM_PROCESS where STATUS_VALUE = 'ACTV' ORDER BY DESCRIPTION

SELECT BP.PROCESS_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,BC.VERSION) + ')'AS PROCESS_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID ORDER BY PROCESS_NAME
